name: Doofa
overview:
An online marketplace for people to buy and sell services for Â£5, Â£10, Â£20 and Â£50.

flexible working arrangements doofa.co.uk solves both of these problems.

Doofa.co.uk is an online marketplace for people to buy and sell their services for a set amount of money.

Buyers are people that want to buy products or services for a fixed price, are looking for inventive/unique gifts or looking for cost effective solutions to problems they have or tasks they want completing.

Sellers cover a broad range of services such as programming, teaching, music, graphic design (inc web design), jewellery making, art, drama, writing and fun gift ideas to name just a few.

Sellers are attracted by the following advantages:

Ability to make money from home for their services/products Small businesses can add additional revenue by utilising an easy to use selling service Flexibility to work hours that suit their lifestyle Students can top up their loans without commiting to an employer Fixed price agreements No selling required No face to face negotiations Direct transfers to their paypal account
